All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli
This package contains all the classes needed to run the CLI client.
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
This package contains all the classes needed to run the GUI client.
it.polimi.ingsw.controller
This package contains all the Controller's classes
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.exceptions
Exceptions triggerable by the Server
it.polimi.ingsw.messages
In this package are included all the classes representing the messages the Client can send towards the Server
it.polimi.ingsw.model
This package contains all the classes of the model on Server
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characters
This package contains all the classes needed to manage the Characters'special powers
it.polimi.ingsw.model.exceptions
This package contains all the Esceptions triggerable by errors on model
it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules
This package contains all the classes needed to manage the Characters'special powers
it.polimi.ingsw.server
This package contains all the classes to manage the Players'connections and the matchmaking
it.polimi.ingsw.view
This package contains the classes to run a remoteView on Server for every Player and the Report message sent by the Server to the Client
